00205 //----------------------------------------------------------
00206 void UTX_InitStream( UTX_stream_t* stream )
00207 {
00208         stream->file = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00209         stream->fileName = 0;
00210         stream->mipLevels = 0;
00211         stream->header = 0;
00212         stream->channelHeaders = 0;
00213         stream->offset = 0;
00214 }
00215 
00216 //----------------------------------------------------------
00217 bool UTX_IsStream( UTX_stream_t* stream )
00218 {
00220         return ( stream->file != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE );
00221 }
00222 
00223 //----------------------------------------------------------
00224 bool UTX_CreateStream( UTX_stream_t* stream, const char* fileName, int width, int height, int stageCount,
00225                                            UTFlags* flags, int* channels )
00226 {
00227         CheckInit();
00228 
00230         memset( stream, 0, sizeof( UTX_stream_t ) );
00231 
00233         if ( fileName == 0 || strlen( fileName ) == 0 )
00234                 return false;
00235         if ( width < UTX_TILE_SIZE || height < UTX_TILE_SIZE )
00236                 return false;
00237         if ( width > UTX_MAX_SIZE || height > UTX_MAX_SIZE )
00238                 return false;
00239         for ( int i = 0; i < stageCount; ++i )
00240         {
00241                 if ( channels[ i ] < 1 || channels[ i ] > UTX_MAX_CHANNELS )
00242                         return false;
00243                 if ( flags[ i ] & UTX_FLAGS_FINALIZED )
00244                         return false;
00245         }
00246 
00248         HANDLE file = CreateFile( fileName, GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE, 0, NULL, CREATE_ALWAYS,
00249                 FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL | FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING, NULL );
00250         stream->file = ( void* )file;
00251         stream->offset = 0;
00252 
00254         if ( file == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00255                 return false;
00256 
00258         stream->fileName = CopyStr( fileName );
00259 
00261         UTHeader* header = ( UTHeader* )malloc( sizeof( UTHeader ) );
00262         UTStageHeader* stageHeaders = ( UTStageHeader* )malloc( stageCount * sizeof( UTStageHeader ) );
00263         UTChannelHeader** channelHeaders = ( UTChannelHeader** )malloc( stageCount * sizeof( UTChannelHeader* ) );
00264 
00266         int totalChannelCount = 0;
00267         for ( int i = 0; i < stageCount; ++i )
00268         {
00269                 channelHeaders[ i ] = ( UTChannelHeader* )malloc( channels[ i ] * sizeof( UTChannelHeader ) );
00270                 for ( int j = 0; j < channels[ i ]; ++j )
00271                         channelHeaders[ i ][ j ].flags = 0;
00272                 stageHeaders[ i ].numChannels = channels[ i ];
00273                 stageHeaders[ i ].flags = flags[ i ];
00274                 totalChannelCount += channels[ i ];
00275         }
00276 
00278         unsigned int tileSize = totalChannelCount * UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES;
00279         tileSize += UT_ALIGNMENT_MASK;
00280         tileSize &= ~UT_ALIGNMENT_MASK;
00281 
00283         stream->header = header;
00284         stream->stageHeaders = stageHeaders;
00285         stream->channelHeaders = channelHeaders;
00286 
00288         header->magic = UTX_MAGIC;
00289         header->version = UTX_FILE_VERSION;
00290         header->width = width;
00291         header->height = height;
00292         header->numStages = stageCount;
00293         header->tileSize = tileSize;
00294 
00296         unsigned char writeBuffer[ UT_ALIGNMENT ];
00297         unsigned char* writeBufferDst = writeBuffer;
00298         MemSet( writeBuffer, 0, UT_ALIGNMENT );
00299 
00301         MemCopy( writeBufferDst, header, sizeof( UTHeader ) );
00302         writeBufferDst += sizeof( UTHeader );
00303 
00305         for ( int i = 0; i < stageCount; ++i )
00306         {
00308                 MemCopy( writeBufferDst, stageHeaders + i, sizeof( UTStageHeader ) );
00309                 writeBufferDst += sizeof( UTStageHeader );
00310 
00312                 int channelCount = stageHeaders[ i ].numChannels;
00313                 int writeSize = channelCount * sizeof( UTChannelHeader );
00314                 MemCopy( writeBufferDst, channelHeaders[ i ], writeSize );
00315                 writeBufferDst += writeSize;
00316         }
00317 
00319         WriteStream( stream, writeBuffer, UT_ALIGNMENT );
00320 
00322         int widthInTiles = width / UTX_TILE_SIZE;
00323         int heightInTiles = height / UTX_TILE_SIZE;
00324 
00326         stream->widthInTiles = widthInTiles;
00327         stream->heightInTiles = heightInTiles;
00328         stream->mipLevels = CalcMipCount( widthInTiles, heightInTiles );
00329 
00331         SetStreamAddrMap( stream );
00332 
00334         void* buffer = AlignedAlloc( UT_ALIGNMENT, tileSize );
00335         memset( buffer, 0x7F, tileSize );
00336 
00338         int tileCount = 0;
00339         for ( int m = 0; m < stream->mipLevels; ++m )
00340         {
00342                 int mipWidth = Max( stream->widthInTiles >> m, 1 );
00343                 int mipHeight = Max( stream->heightInTiles >> m, 1 );
00344 
00346                 tileCount += mipWidth * mipHeight;
00347         }
00348 
00350         for ( int t = 0; t < tileCount; ++t )
00351         {
00353                 if ( !WriteStream( stream, buffer, tileSize ) )
00354                 {
00355                         UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00356                         return false;
00357                 }
00358         }
00359 
00361         AlignedFree( buffer );
00362 
00364         return true;
00365 }
00366 
00367 //----------------------------------------------------------
00368 bool UTX_OpenStream( UTX_stream_t* stream, const char* fileName )
00369 {
00370         CheckInit();
00371 
00373         memset( stream, 0, sizeof( UTX_stream_t ) );
00374 
00376         if ( fileName == 0 )
00377                 return false;
00378 
00380         HANDLE file = CreateFile( fileName, GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE, 0, NULL, OPEN_EXISTING,
00381                 FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL | FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING, NULL );
00382         stream->file = ( void* )file;
00383         stream->offset = 0;
00384 
00386         if ( file == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00387                 return false;
00388 
00390         stream->fileName = CopyStr( fileName );
00391 
00393         unsigned char readBuffer[ UT_ALIGNMENT ];
00394         unsigned char* readBufferSrc = readBuffer;
00395         if ( !ReadStream( readBuffer, stream, UT_ALIGNMENT ) )
00396         {
00397                 UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00398                 return false;
00399         }
00400 
00402         UTHeader* header = ( UTHeader* )malloc( sizeof( UTHeader ) );
00403         stream->header = header;
00404         MemCopy( header, readBufferSrc, sizeof( UTHeader ) );
00405         readBufferSrc += sizeof( UTHeader );
00406 
00408         if ( header->magic != UTX_MAGIC || header->version != UTX_FILE_VERSION )
00409         {
00410                 UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00411                 return false;
00412         }
00413 
00415         UTStageHeader* stageHeaders = ( UTStageHeader* )malloc( header->numStages * sizeof( UTStageHeader ) );
00416         UTChannelHeader** channelHeaders = ( UTChannelHeader** )malloc( header->numStages * sizeof( UTChannelHeader* ) );
00417         for ( int i = 0; i < header->numStages; ++i )
00418         {
00420                 MemCopy( stageHeaders + i, readBufferSrc, sizeof( UTStageHeader ) );
00421                 readBufferSrc += sizeof( UTStageHeader );
00422 
00424                 int channelCount = stageHeaders[ i ].numChannels;
00425                 channelHeaders[ i ] = ( UTChannelHeader* )malloc( channelCount * sizeof( UTChannelHeader ) );
00426 
00427                 int readSize = channelCount * sizeof( UTChannelHeader );
00428                 MemCopy( channelHeaders[ i ], readBufferSrc, readSize );
00429                 readBufferSrc += readSize;
00430         }
00431 
00432         stream->stageHeaders = stageHeaders;
00433         stream->channelHeaders = channelHeaders;
00434 
00436         int widthInTiles = header->width / UTX_TILE_SIZE;
00437         int heightInTiles = header->height / UTX_TILE_SIZE;
00438         stream->widthInTiles = widthInTiles;
00439         stream->heightInTiles = heightInTiles;
00440         stream->mipLevels = CalcMipCount( widthInTiles, heightInTiles );
00441 
00443         SetStreamAddrMap( stream );
00444 
00446         return true;
00447 }

00473 //----------------------------------------------------------
00474 UTFlags UTX_GetStageFlags( UTX_stream_t* stream, int stage )
00475 {
00476         assert( stage < stream->header->numStages );
00477         return stream->stageHeaders[ stage ].flags;
00478 }

00480 //----------------------------------------------------------
00481 int UTX_NumStageChannels( UTX_stream_t* stream, int stage )
00482 {
00483         assert( stage < stream->header->numStages );
00484         return stream->stageHeaders[ stage ].numChannels;
00485 }

00487 //----------------------------------------------------------
00488 int UTX_CalcStageTileSize( UTX_stream_t* stream, int stage )
00489 {
00490         assert( stage < stream->header->numStages );
00491         return ( stream->stageHeaders[ stage ].numChannels * UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES );
00492 }
00493 
00494 //----------------------------------------------------------
00495 int UTX_CalcTileSize( UTX_stream_t* stream )
00496 {
00498         int size = 0;
00499         int stageCount = UTX_NumStages( stream );
00500         for ( int s = 0; s < stageCount; ++s )
00501                 size += UTX_CalcStageTileSize( stream, s );
00502 
00504         return size;
00505 }
00506 
00507 //----------------------------------------------------------
00508 void UTX_CloseStream( UTX_stream_t* stream )
00509 {
00510         if ( stream->file != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00511                 CloseHandle( ( HANDLE )stream->file );
00512 
00513         if ( stream->fileName )
00514                 free( stream->fileName );
00515 
00516         if ( stream->header )
00517                 free( stream->header );
00518 
00519         if ( stream->channelHeaders )
00520                 free( stream->channelHeaders );
00521 
00522         UTX_InitStream( stream );
00523 }

00525 //----------------------------------------------------------
00526 void UTX_OptimizeReadOrder( UTX_stream_t* stream, unsigned int* packedTiles, unsigned int count )
00527 {
00529         EnsureBuffer( count * 2 * sizeof( UTSortInfo ) );
00530 
00532         UTSortInfo* sortInfo = ( UTSortInfo* )_buffer;
00533         UTSortInfo* sortInfoDst = sortInfo;
00534         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < count; ++i, ++sortInfoDst )
00535         {
00537                 int mip = packedTiles[ i ] & 0xFF;
00538                 int x = ( packedTiles[ i ] >>  8 ) & 0xFFF;
00539                 int y = ( packedTiles[ i ] >> 20 ) & 0xFFF;
00540 
00542                 sortInfoDst->tile = packedTiles[ i ];
00543                 sortInfoDst->addr = GetTileAddr( stream, mip, x, y );
00544         }
00545 
00547         std::sort( sortInfo, sortInfo + count, UTSortInfoCompare );
00548 
00550         UTSortInfo* sortInfoSrc = sortInfo;
00551         unsigned int* packedTilesDst = packedTiles;
00552         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < count; ++i, ++sortInfoSrc, ++packedTilesDst )
00553                 *packedTilesDst = sortInfoSrc->tile;
00554 }
00555 
00556 //----------------------------------------------------------
00557 bool UTX_ReadTile( UTX_stream_t* stream, void* vdest, int x, int y, int mipLevel, int* bytesRead )
00558 {
00559         char* dest = ( char* )vdest;
00560 
00562         if ( !SeekToTile( stream, x, y, mipLevel ) )
00563                 return false;
00564 
00566         int tileSize = stream->header->tileSize;
00567         if ( bytesRead )
00568                 *bytesRead += tileSize;
00569 
00572         EnsureBuffer( tileSize + UTX_MAX_TILE_SIZE_IN_BYTES );
00573 
00574 #if PROFILE_DISK_SPEED
00575         unsigned int readStartTime = timeGetTime();
00576 #endif
00577 
00581         ReadStream( _buffer, stream, tileSize );
00582 
00583 #if PROFILE_DISK_SPEED
00584         unsigned int readEndTime = timeGetTime();
00585         unsigned int readTotalTime = readEndTime - readStartTime;
00586         PrintF( "Tile disk access time: %d\n", readTotalTime );
00587 #endif
00588 
00589 #if 0
00590         MemCopy( dest, _buffer, tileSize );
00591 #else
00594         char* compressed = ( char* )_buffer;
00595         char* decompressed = ( char* )_buffer + tileSize;
00596         UTChannelHeader* channelHeader = 0;
00597         UTChannelFlags channelFlags = 0;
00598         int numStages = stream->header->numStages;
00599         for ( int s = 0; s < numStages; ++s )
00600         {
00601 
00603                 char* dst = ( char* )decompressed;
00604                 int numChannels = stream->stageHeaders[ s ].numChannels;
00605                 for ( int i = 0; i < numChannels; ++i, dst += UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES )
00606                 {
00608                         channelHeader = stream->channelHeaders[ s ] + i;
00609                         channelFlags = channelHeader->flags;
00610 
00612                         if ( channelFlags & UTX_CHANNELFLAGS_DCT )
00613                         {
00615                                 B_ASSERT( false );
00616                         }
00617                         else
00618                         {
00620                                 MemCopy( dst, compressed, UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES );
00621 
00623                                 compressed += UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES;
00624                         }
00625                 }
00626 
00628                 char* src = decompressed;
00629                 dst = ( char* )dest;
00630                 for ( int c = 0; c < numChannels; ++c, src += UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES, ++dst )
00631                         for ( int p = 0; p < UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES; ++p )
00632                                 dst[ p * numChannels ] = src[ p ];
00633 
00635                 dest += numChannels * UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES;
00636         }
00637 #endif
00638 
00640         return true;
00641 }
00642 
00643 //----------------------------------------------------------
00644 bool UTX_WriteTile( UTX_stream_t* stream, int x, int y, int mipLevel, const void* vsource, int* bytesWritten )
00645 {
00646         assert( ( x << mipLevel ) < stream->widthInTiles );
00647         assert( ( y << mipLevel ) < stream->heightInTiles );
00648 
00650         int numStages = stream->header->numStages;
00651 
00653         for ( int i = 0; i < numStages; ++i )
00654         {
00655                 int numChannels = stream->stageHeaders[ i ].numChannels;
00656                 for ( int j = 0; j < numChannels; ++j )
00657                 {
00658                         if ( stream->channelHeaders[ i ][ j ].flags != 0 )
00659                                 return false;
00660                 }
00661         }
00662 
00664         if ( !SeekToTile( stream, x, y, mipLevel ) )
00665                 return false;
00666         if ( bytesWritten )
00667                 *bytesWritten += stream->header->tileSize;
00668 
00670         EnsureBuffer( UTX_MAX_CHANNELS * UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES );
00671 
00673         char* source = ( char* )vsource;
00674         for ( int i = 0; i < numStages; ++i )
00675         {
00677                 UTStageHeader* stageHeader = stream->stageHeaders + i;
00678 
00680                 int numChannels = stageHeader->numChannels;
00681                 char* src = ( char* )source;
00682                 char* dst = ( char* )_buffer;
00683                 for ( int c = 0; c < numChannels; ++c, dst += UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES, ++src )
00684                 {
00685                         for ( int p = 0; p < UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES; ++p )
00686                                 dst[ p ] = src[ p * numChannels ];
00687                 }
00688 
00690                 WriteStream( stream, ( char* )_buffer, ( unsigned int )( dst - ( char* )_buffer ) );
00691 
00693                 source += numChannels * UTX_CHANNEL_SIZE_IN_BYTES;
00694         }
00695 
00697         return true;
00698 }
00699 
00700 
00701 //**********************************************************
00703 //**********************************************************
00704 
00705 //----------------------------------------------------------
00706 void CheckInit()
00707 {
00708         if ( _utxInit )
00709                 return;
00710         _utxInit = true;
00711         memset( _addrMaps, 0, sizeof( _addrMaps ) );
00712         atexit( OnExit );
00713 }
00714 
00715 //----------------------------------------------------------
00716 void OnExit()
00717 {
00719         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < UTX_MAX_MIP_LEVEL_COUNT; ++i )
00720         {
00721                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < UTX_MAX_MIP_LEVEL_COUNT; ++j )
00722                 {
00723                         if ( _addrMaps[ i ][ j ] != 0 )
00724                                 free( _addrMaps[ i ][ j ] );
00725                 }
00726         }
00727 
00729         AlignedFree( _buffer );
00730 }
00731 
00732 //----------------------------------------------------------
00733 void SetStreamAddrMap( UTX_stream_t* stream )
00734 {
00736         int i = ( int )Log2( ( unsigned int )stream->widthInTiles );
00737         int j = ( int )Log2( ( unsigned int )stream->heightInTiles );
00738 
00740         if ( _addrMaps[ i ][ j ] == 0 )
00741         {
00743                 unsigned int mipCount = stream->mipLevels;
00744                 UTTileAddrMap* newAddrMaps = ( UTTileAddrMap* )malloc( mipCount * sizeof( UTTileAddrMap ) );
00745                 _addrMaps[ i ][ j ] = newAddrMaps;
00746 
00748                 int mipWidth = stream->widthInTiles;
00749                 int mipHeight = stream->heightInTiles;
00750                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < mipCount; ++i )
00751                 {
00752                         newAddrMaps[ i ].table = ( int* )malloc( mipWidth * mipHeight * sizeof( int ) );
00753                         mipWidth >>= 1;
00754                         mipHeight >>= 1;
00755                 }
00756 
00758                 stream->tileAddrMaps = newAddrMaps;
00759 
00761                 GenAddrMap( stream );
00762         }
00763         else
00764         {
00765                 stream->tileAddrMaps = _addrMaps[ i ][ j ];
00766         }
00767 }
00768 
00769 //----------------------------------------------------------
00770 int GetTileAddr( UTX_stream_t* stream, int mip, int x, int y )
00771 {
00772     B_ASSERT( mip < stream->mipLevels );
00773 
00776         int* addrMap = stream->tileAddrMaps[ mip ].table;
00777 
00779         int mipWidth = stream->widthInTiles >> mip;
00780 
00782         return addrMap[ y * mipWidth + x ];
00783 }
00784 
00785 //----------------------------------------------------------
00786 void GenAddrMap( UTX_stream_t* stream )
00787 {
00788         int offset = 1;
00789         int mip = stream->mipLevels - 1;
00790         BuildTileIndexMap( stream, offset, mip, 0, 0 );
00791 }
00792 
00793 //----------------------------------------------------------
00794 void BuildTileIndexMap( UTX_stream_t* stream, int& offset, int mip, int x, int y )
00795 {
00797         unsigned int mipWidth = stream->widthInTiles >> mip;
00798         stream->tileAddrMaps[ mip ].table[ y * mipWidth + x ] = offset;
00799 
00801         ++offset;
00802 
00804         if ( mip > 0 )
00805         {
00807                 unsigned int nx0 = x + x;
00808                 unsigned int ny0 = y + y;
00809                 unsigned int nx1 = nx0 + 1;
00810                 unsigned int ny1 = ny0 + 1;
00811                 unsigned int nm = mip - 1;
00812 
00814                 unsigned int width = Max( stream->widthInTiles >> nm, 1 );
00815                 unsigned int height = Max( stream->heightInTiles >> nm, 1 );
00816 
00818                 BuildTileIndexMap( stream, offset, nm, nx0, ny0 );
00819                 if ( nx1 < width )
00820                         BuildTileIndexMap( stream, offset, nm, nx1, ny0 );
00821                 if ( ny1 < height )
00822                         BuildTileIndexMap( stream, offset, nm, nx0, ny1 );
00823                 if ( nx1 < width && ny1 < height )
00824                         BuildTileIndexMap( stream, offset, nm, nx1, ny1 );
00825         }
00826 }
00827 
00828 //----------------------------------------------------------
00829 void EnsureBuffer( unsigned int size )
00830 {
00832         if ( size > _bufferSize )
00833         {
00835                 size += UT_ALIGNMENT;
00836                 if ( _buffer )
00837                 {
00838                         AlignedFree( _buffer );
00839                         _buffer = AlignedAlloc( UT_ALIGNMENT, size );
00840                 }
00841                 else
00842                         _buffer = AlignedAlloc( UT_ALIGNMENT, size );
00843 
00845                 _bufferSize = size;
00846         }
00847 }
00848 
00849 //----------------------------------------------------------
00850 char* CopyStr( const char* src )
00851 {
00852         size_t len = strlen( src );
00853         char* str = ( char* )malloc( len+1 );
00854         strcpy( str, src );
00855         return str;
00856 }
00857 
00858 //----------------------------------------------------------
00859 int CalcMipCount( int width, int height )
00860 {
00862         int mipDim = Max( width, height );
00863         int mipLevels = 0;
00864         while ( mipDim > 0 )
00865         {
00866                 ++mipLevels;
00867                 mipDim >>= 1;
00868         }
00869         return mipLevels;
00870 }
00871 
00872 //----------------------------------------------------------
00873 int CalcRowOffsetIdx( UTX_stream_t* stream, int mip, int row )
00874 {
00876         int heightInRows = stream->heightInTiles;
00877         int idx = row;
00878         while ( mip-- > 0 )
00879                 idx += ( heightInRows >> mip );
00880 
00882         return idx;
00883 }
00884 
00885 //----------------------------------------------------------
00886 bool WriteStream( UTX_stream_t* stream, void* src, unsigned int bytes )
00887 {
00889         DWORD bytesWritten = 0;
00890         BOOL ret = WriteFile( ( HANDLE )stream->file, src, bytes, &bytesWritten, NULL );
00892         if ( !ret || bytesWritten < bytes )
00893         {
00894                 UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00895                 return false;
00896         }
00897 
00899         stream->offset += bytes;
00900 
00902         return true;
00903 }
00904 
00905 //----------------------------------------------------------
00906 bool ReadStream( void* dst, UTX_stream_t* stream, unsigned int bytes )
00907 {
00909         DWORD bytesRead = 0;
00910         BOOL ret = ReadFile( ( HANDLE )stream->file, dst, bytes, &bytesRead, NULL );
00911 
00913         if ( !ret || bytesRead < bytes )
00914         {
00915                 UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00916                 return false;
00917         }
00918 
00920         stream->offset += bytes;
00921 
00923         return true;
00924 }
00925 
00926 //----------------------------------------------------------
00927 bool SetStreamPos( UTX_stream_t* stream, __int64 offset )
00928 {
00929         long highWord = ( long )( offset >> 32 );
00930         DWORD ret = SetFilePointer( ( HANDLE )stream->file, ( long )offset & 0xFFFFFFFF,
00931                 &highWord, FILE_BEGIN );
00932         if ( ret == INVALID_SET_FILE_POINTER )
00933         {
00935                 DWORD error = GetLastError();
00936                 if ( error != NO_ERROR )
00937                 {
00939                         UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00940                         return false;
00941                 }
00942         }
00943 
00946         __int64 newAddr = highWord;
00947         newAddr <<= 32;
00948         newAddr |= ret;
00949 
00951         if ( newAddr != offset )
00952         {
00954                 UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00955                 return false;
00956         }
00957 
00959         stream->offset = offset;
00960 
00962         return true;
00963 }
00964 
00965 //----------------------------------------------------------
00966 bool SeekStream( UTX_stream_t* stream, __int64 offset )
00967 {
00968         long highWord = ( long )( offset >> 32 );
00969         DWORD ret = SetFilePointer( ( HANDLE )stream->file, ( long )offset & 0xFFFFFFFF,
00970                 &highWord, FILE_CURRENT );
00971         if ( ret == INVALID_SET_FILE_POINTER )
00972         {
00974                 DWORD error = GetLastError();
00975                 if ( error != NO_ERROR )
00976                 {
00978                         UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00979                         return false;
00980                 }
00981         }
00982 
00985         __int64 newAddr = highWord;
00986         newAddr <<= 32;
00987         newAddr |= ret;
00988 
00990         stream->offset += offset;
00991 
00993         if ( stream->offset != newAddr )
00994         {
00996                 UTX_CloseStream( stream );
00997                 return false;
00998         }
00999 
01001         return true;    
01002 }
01003 
01004 //----------------------------------------------------------
01005 bool SeekToTile( UTX_stream_t* stream, int x, int y, int mip )
01006 {
01008         __int64 addr = GetTileAddr( stream, mip, x, y );
01009 
01011         __int64 offset = addr * stream->header->tileSize;
01012 
01014         if ( stream->offset == offset )
01015                 return true;
01016 
01017 #if PROFILE_DISK_SPEED
01018         PrintF( "Disk seek occured.\n" );
01019 #endif
01020 
01022         return SetStreamPos( stream, offset );
01023 }
